text: Cyclone Pam is a 2015 Pacific Ocean tropical cyclone. The storm caused major devastation in Vanuatu. It is the second most intense storm according to pressure, after Cyclone Zoe in 2002. The storm has killed many people and caused heavy damage. Pam formed March 6 east of the Solomon Islands. It reached Category 5 on Saffir-Simpson Scale. It caused damaging storm surges in certain areas. ==References== Category:2015 in weather Category:Tropical cyclones in Oceania Category:21st century in Vanuatu Category:2015 in Oceania Category:Retired tropical cyclone names
title: Cyclone Pam
